title.rendered: How to Spot the Best Football Betting Sites

content.rendered:
Today’s online betting market is pretty saturated. New betting sites are popping up left and right every day, and it’s becoming increasingly hard for casual and master punters to spot a good bookie. As technology evolves, so do bookies, and it can be hard to keep track of all the new features and elements at new online betting sites. But that’s why you’re probably here reading this. Our guide will show you how to find the best football betting sites and place your bets with ease.

Betting shops are a thing of the past. In 2021, online bookies rule the industry. However, choosing one has never been harder. The good news for you is that here in this article, bettingsites.info recommends a bunch of bookies that deserve your attention. We have it all – from the bookies with the highest free bets to the best odds in the business. Of course, all the sites are fully legit, so you don’t have to worry about any legal consequences.

The Factors That Make or Break a Football Betting Site

There’s no single factor that constitutes how a good football betting site in 2021 should look like. You have to check the license, you have to check the markets, match predictions, odds, special features, and the such. In this guide, we’ll show you the most important elements to look for so you can join a trusted and great betting site.

If you want to be able to collect your winnings from an online bookie, you’ll first need to find a reliable site. We’re sad to say that not all bookies on the market in 2021 are created equal or are legal. There are plenty of rogue sites out there since its hard for the authorities to keep track and fish them all out of the pond. The good news is that a simple license check at the bottom of the page will help you identify a good bookie.

You’ll be looking for a betting site with UKGC or MGA license. Other proper licenses include the Gibraltar Commission or Alderney Gambling Control Commission. A bookie with either of these licenses can be called safe. Many of them will have the license number stamped in the footer too, so you can check it at the respective governing body’s website.

Bookmakers in 2021 should provide a safe and secure betting environment for their punters. In most cases, betting sites use SSL encryption that will keep your private data and transactions safe and sound. It’s an absolute must for a bookie in today’s market, so don’t join a site that doesn’t have it. You can check for the SSL encryption by clicking on the padlock icon in your browser’s address bar (usually on the left side). If it’s green, the site is SSL protected and safe to join. If it isn’t, your browser will warn you about the unsafe connection.

As far as safety and security is concerned, a bookie with a proper license and SSL encryption should be perfectly safe. Now comes the more important part for punters – markets and odds.

Markets, Odds, and Customer Support

Besides the legal side of things, a good betting site should have dozens of sports, thousands of markets, special features and great odds in two. Online betting sites have taken things up a notch when it comes to the selection of markets. You can bet on more things now than ever before. We’re not just talking outrights, match winners, and handicaps. Online betting sites in 2021 offer markets beyond your imagination that can drastically improve your chances of winning.

The more markets a bookie has, the better for you. This goes for both pre-match and live markets. Live betting is a hit right now, so don’t even consider a bookie without it. It would be nice if it has live streaming too, but not a dealbreaker.

When it comes to the odds, it’s very important to shop for odds first, meaning browsing online bookies to find the best deals. After all, why should you stick to a bookie that pays less in returns for your money? Choose the one with the best odds and you’ll always have the best deal on hand.

Of course, it makes sense to also check out a bookie’s promotions. Many will offer free bets on sign up, but you should get more promos later too. Make sure the wagering requirements are fair on those bonuses too. If they’re impossible to complete, it doesn’t matter how great the bonus is.

Last, but not least, the customer support is of great importance when choosing a bookie. You’ll want one that will offer several channels (email, live chat) and has fast response times. Alternatively, a good bookie will also have at least a FAQ page or a Help Center with common questions regarding online betting answered.
